index.title: LiveWallpaper - Giantapp Studio

meta.description: A free and open source win10 live wallpaper software - LiveWallpaper official website
meta.keywords: LiveWallpaper app, Win10 wallpaper, dynamic wallpaper

index.intro: An exquisite Window10 dynamic (static) open source wallpaper app
index.whyUse1Tips: Free to use, focus on free software
index.whyUse2Tips: Client open source on GitHub, don't be evil
index.whyUse3Tips: Simple and fast, no useless bundling features
index.whyUse4Tips: Easily upload, download and favorite wallpapers
